OOC: Okay, every post sent by Scorpius, has a date on it before he quit.
Sooooo, I am assuming he has quit, and his posts were just delayed. If I
am wrong, Scorpius, tell me, and I will take back this post. (Just
imagine they never appeared:))

BIC:
Megatron opens up his comm-link. "Astroblast, get here amediately. You
will be needed for phase two of my plan" he finishes, as his voicepiece
contracts. He smiles a twisted expression, as his eyes begin to glow
red. "Switchblade, get Speedbreaker fixed. He will be needed for my
future plans". Megatron then looks at Triggerhappy, Scourge, and
Cyclonus. "Transform my Decepticons, and ATTACK" he yells, poiting at
the Element. "Nightstrike, follow their flank, and listen to Cyclonus.
Motormaster, continue the plan. Skullgrin" he yells reffering to the
Pretender. "Receive". 

Megatron then jumps straight up into the air, and starts a back flip. As
he does, he starts to fold in on himself, and shrink, transforming into
his gun mode. He then falls towards Skullgrin, waiting for him to catch
him.


Motormaster walks up towards Speedbreaker, to inspect the damage.

Wildrider continues to fall, and gracefully just misses the shells, as
he was keeping his eyes on Incarcinerator. He looks towards Shockwave,
and starts to laugh. "Commander Shockwave. Megatron wishes to speak to
you".
